attributes.action: Allow a tuition fee refund for uni students
attributes.additional_details: We want the parliament to allow students to receive a full or partial university tuition fees refund. It is not fair that we have to pay £9k+ for the education that we aren’t completely receiving. What we pay for is to be taught within the campus. Online learning is not the same as face to face learning. We are not provided with the support needed and tutors are marking us to the standard that was required whilst being taught face to face. Our learning has not developed and it’s hard to flourish
attributes.background: Due to COVID and the pandemic university students have not had the best education provided by tutors or even universities. we are not getting the support that we need in order to develop our learning.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
